title: 10 Tips for Kubernetes Architects on K8s' 10th Birthday
author: Raghavan Srinivas
description: In this interview, CNCF head of Ecosystem Taylor Dolezal provides ten tips for architects to navigate Kubernetes and its ecosystem.
cntitle: Kubernetes 架构师的 10 条技巧：献给 K8s 十周年
cndescription: 本次访谈中，CNCF 生态系统负责人 Taylor Dolezal 为架构师提供了十条关于如何驾驭 Kubernetes 及其生态系统的建议。
